1475  ChairListSlots[i].Clear(); // Last user of current slot set to 0 (none sit here yet)
1476  else
1477  ChairListSlots[0].Clear(); // error in DB, make one default slot
1478  }
1479 
1480  Player* player = user->ToPlayer();
1481 
1482  // a chair may have n slots. we have to calculate their positions and teleport the player to the nearest one
1483 
1484  float lowestDist = DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1485 
1486  uint32 nearest_slot = 0;
1487  float x_lowest = GetPositionX();
1488  float y_lowest = GetPositionY();
1489 
1490  // the object orientation + 1/2 pi
1491  // every slot will be on that straight line
1492  float orthogonalOrientation = GetOrientation() + M_PI * 0.5f;
1493  // find nearest slot
1494  bool found_free_slot = false;
1495  for (ChairSlotAndUser::iterator itr = ChairListSlots.begin(); itr != ChairListSlots.end(); ++itr)
1496  {
1497  // the distance between this slot and the center of the go - imagine a 1D space
1498  float relativeDistance = (info->size * itr->first) - (info->size * (info->chair.slots - 1) / 2.0f);
1499 
1500  float x_i = GetPositionX() + relativeDistance * cos(orthogonalOrientation);
1501  float y_i = GetPositionY() + relativeDistance * sin(orthogonalOrientation);
1502 
1503  if (itr->second)
1504  {
1505  if (Player* ChairUser = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*this, itr->second))
1506  {
1507  if (ChairUser->IsSitState() && ChairUser->getStandState() != UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT && ChairUser->GetExactDist2d(x_i, y_i) < 0.1f)
1508  continue; // This seat is already occupied by ChairUser. NOTE: Not sure if the ChairUser->getStandState() != UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT check is required.
1509  else
1510  itr->second.Clear(); // This seat is unoccupied.
1511  }
1512  else
1513  itr->second.Clear(); // The seat may of had an occupant, but they're offline.
1514  }
1515 
1516  found_free_slot = true;
1517 
1518  // calculate the distance between the player and this slot
1519  float thisDistance = player->GetDistance2d(x_i, y_i);
1520 
1521  if (thisDistance <= lowestDist)
1522  {
1523  nearest_slot = itr->first;
1524  lowestDist = thisDistance;
1525  x_lowest = x_i;
1526  y_lowest = y_i;
1527  }
1528  }
1529 
1530  if (found_free_slot)
1531  {
1532  ChairSlotAndUser::iterator itr = ChairListSlots.find(nearest_slot);
1533  if (itr != ChairListSlots.end())
1534  {
1535  itr->second = player->GetGUID(); //this slot in now used by player
1536  player->TeleportTo(GetMapId(), x_lowest, y_lowest, GetPositionZ(), GetOrientation(), TELE_TO_NOT_LEAVE_TRANSPORT | TELE_TO_NOT_LEAVE_COMBAT | TELE_TO_NOT_UNSUMMON_PET);
1537  player->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_LOW_CHAIR + info->chair.height);
1538  return;
1539  }
1540  }
1541 
1542  return;
1543  }
1544  //big gun, its a spell/aura
1545  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GOOBER: //10
1546  {
1547  GameObjectTemplate const* info = GetGOInfo();
1548 
1549  // xinef: Goober cannot be used with this flag, skip

1580  if (player->GetQuestStatus(info->goober.questId) != QUEST_STATUS_INCOMPLETE)
1581  break;
1582  }
1583

1585  bg->EventPlayerUsedGO(player, this);
1586

1595  member->KillCreditGO(info->entry, GetGUID());
1596  }
1597  }
1598  }
1599  }
1600  else
1601  {
1602  player->KillCreditGO(info->entry, GetGUID());
1603  }
1604  }

1613  if (!info->goober.customAnim)
1614  SetGoState(GO_STATE_ACTIVE);
1615  }
1616

1618  if (info->goober.customAnim)
1619  SendCustomAnim(GetGoAnimProgress());
1620 
1621  m_cooldownTime = World::GetGameTimeMS() + info->GetAutoCloseTime();
1622 
1623  // cast this spell later if provided
1624  spellId = info->goober.spellId;
1625  spellCaster = user;
1626  tmpfish = true;
1627

1629  }

1678  {
1679  chance = int32(pow((double)skill / zone_skill, 2) * 100);
1680  if (chance < 1)
1681  chance = 1;
1682  }
1683  else

1688  LOG_DEBUG("entities.gameobject", "Fishing check (skill: %i zone min skill: %i chance %i roll: %i", skill, zone_skill, chance, roll);
1689 
1690  // but you will likely cause junk in areas that require a high fishing skill (not yet implemented)
1691  if (chance >= roll)
1692  {
1693  player->UpdateFishingSkill();
1694 
1695  //TODO: I do not understand this hack. Need some explanation.
1696  // prevent removing GO at spell cancel
1697  RemoveFromOwner();
